data.title: Shivanku Misra, McKesson VP and Head of Enterprise Advanced Analytics Joins CDO Magazine Global Editorial Board
data.meta_description: Shivanku Misra, McKesson VP and Head of Enterprise Advanced Analytics, joins CDO Magazine's Global Editorial Board, bringing expertise in data leadership and driving growth through advanced analytics.
data.text:
(US and Canada) We are pleased to welcome Shivanku Misra to CDO Magazine’s Global Editorial Board. Misra is VP and Head of Enterprise Advanced Analytics at McKesson, a Fortune 10 company dedicated to enhancing care across diverse settings. Misra is a seasoned data and digital leader with a career spanning over 15 years, during which he has spearheaded advanced analytics, data science, AI/ML, and marketing teams across various industries.

Within McKesson, Misra exercises his expertise in overseeing a team of professionals committed to delivering cutting-edge AI/ML solutions. His strategic leadership has consistently contributed to the augmentation of growth, operational efficiency, and heightened customer satisfaction throughout McKesson’s expansive range of businesses and markets.

With a proven track record within data leadership, Misra has generated an impressive US$ 3 billion in net incremental revenues by harnessing the power of advanced analytics and applying domain knowledge in sectors such as consumer goods, healthcare, media, hospitality, and e-commerce.

Misra's influence extends beyond the corporate realm as he garners recognition as a Forbes-featured senior executive. His commitment to fostering innovation is evident in his role as an advisor for multiple startups and a mentor for minority talent. A true champion for inclusion and diversity, Misra envisions a more equitable future in the tech industry.

His mission is rooted in creating a positive impact and value through data and digital transformation. Misra is not only a thought leader but has also made significant contributions to the academic and industry discourse. He has shared his insights through publications and speaking engagements at prestigious platforms, solidifying his position as a respected figure in the realms of analytics and marketing.

As global thought leaders, CDO Magazine’s Editorial Board of top executives share their expert opinions and innovations in data and analytics. The board ensures that we champion the best companies, leaders, and insights that accelerate our community’s success. Members may serve as editorial writers, reviewers, content developers, and conference speakers.
